text: Inni abbaafi haadha isaatiin “isin lachaniifuu ish (uffi)! Kanuma dhaloonni baay’een dabrani jiranu, akka ani kaafamu natti himtuu?” jedheHaala isaan lamaan birmachuu Rabbii gaafachaa, “yaa badii kee! Beellamni Rabbii dhugaadhaa amani” jedhanii gorsanuu “kun ogbarruu warra duriiti malee waa biraa miti” jedha
